short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Page Align Center centers web pages, making them useful for ultra-wide screens or left-aligned websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Customizable Web Page Alignment Tool

Designed for ultrawide and large screens, Page Align Center offers precise control over web page alignment. Center pages as you wish.

How it works:

- Click the extension icon.
- Slide and adjust the centering. It will save configuration where you leave horizontal scroll.
- Enjoy auto centering on saved websites

Abilities & Options:

- Adjust right and left gaps (margins): Customize the spacing on either side of web pages to your liking.
- Sync with Google Account: Seamlessly synchronize your settings and data across multiple devices using your Google account.
- Download extension data: Export your extension's Google sync and local data for backup or transfer purposes.
- Clear extension data: Remove your extension's Google sync and local data to start fresh.
- Import data as text: Easily import data into the extension from a text file.

Security:

- Data privacy: Your data remains secure within your local indexed-db and Google account (Sync). We do not collect or store any of your personal information.
- No third-party involvement: This application is entirely independent and does not have any partnerships or agreements with external entities. Including google analytics of webstore itself.
- No External Library: This application is built entirely with native web technologies, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Join our community: Help us make Page Align Center even better by sharing your feedback and suggestions via X.

Note:
1. Opera users must enable 'Allow access to search page results' in the extension's detail.
2. Page Align Center won't affect the Chrome Web Store page.
